title: Travel the world Watch Face
summary: One minute to take you travel the world!
description: This is a watch face about childhood and dream. Many childhood, even now, have a dream, that is around the world. To see the Eiffel Tower, Big Ben, to visit the Louvre, the Arc de Triomphe, to board the Mount Fuji, to go the Grand Canyon ...... Maybe some people give up, some people are still trying to adhere to the dream. Travel the world watch face, pay tribute to childhood, pay tribute to the dream, pay tribute to the classic. Watchface is small, but dream is big.Features- Watchface for Android Wear Device.- Support round and square displays.- Six modes of a day. watch face change over time.- Customizable hour format.How to use1. Once you install the app, the watchface will be automatically transferred to your watch. (may take a few minutes)2. From watch: Long press your watchface and select the one that you have installed.From mobile: Run the “Android Wear” app and tap “More” button in the watchface section3. Enjoy your new watchface!
descriptionHTML:
This is a watch face about childhood and dream. Many childhood, even now, have a dream, that is around the world. To see the Eiffel Tower, Big Ben, to visit the Louvre, the Arc de Triomphe, to board the Mount Fuji, to go the Grand Canyon ...... Maybe some people give up, some people are still trying to adhere to the dream. Travel the world watch face, pay tribute to childhood, pay tribute to the dream, pay tribute to the classic. Watchface is small, but dream is big.

Features
- Watchface for Android Wear Device.
- Support round and square displays.
- Six modes of a day. watch face change over time.
- Customizable hour format.

How to use
1. Once you install the app, the watchface will be automatically transferred to your watch. (may take a few minutes)
2. From watch: Long press your watchface and select the one that you have installed.
From mobile: Run the “Android Wear” app and tap “More” button in the watchface section
3. Enjoy your new watchface!
comments: Nice Watch face but I can't able to change the color of watch face it's only with black dial...I'm using Fossil Q watch. No setting option ..and second is please give more options of watch face it's just one ....

Nice, but I can't use it as a daily face It's alright, but while the face is lit - it flicks through the rotation over a minute at about 2 fps, it would be nice if it was smoother and more so if I could have the option to have it rotate round the world over the course of an hour or day, rather than just a minute.
One of my favourite watch faces hands down. However, since the recent update it flickers on my Huawei watch 2. Annoying enough to keep me from using it as my daily watch face
Hi, this watch face isn't showing up on my android wear app or my fossil q founder. Please let me know how to fix.
Beautiful Now also perfect on my Zenwatch! I love the colour changes. Thank you!
Love this face! The only thing I would change is to add a 12 hour option!
